meanings.definition: To eat a large amount of food in a short period of time.
meanings.sent1: After the game, the team decided to pigouts on pizza and soda.
meanings.sent2: She always pigouts on popcorn while watching movies.
meanings.sent3: At the picnic, everyone pigouts on the delicious barbecue.
meanings.sent4: During the holidays, it's easy to pigouts on all the festive treats.
meanings.sent5: The kids pigouts on candy at the birthday party.

meanings.sent1: Last night's pigouts left me feeling uncomfortably full.
meanings.sent2: The buffet offered a variety of options for our pigouts.
meanings.sent3: His pigouts at the buffet were legendary among his friends.
meanings.sent4: The pigouts at the family reunion lasted well into the night.
meanings.sent5: The pigouts at the fair included all kinds of fried treats.
